website_summaries.verdict: A simple tripod with a heavy chain strong enough to hold your dutch oven.
pros: Includes an S-hook for the chain
Strong enough to hold a full Dutch oven
Folds skinny for storage and portability
cons: Made from forged steel, not cast iron

website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-duty, forged iron tripod is sturdier than many other models. Just keep in mind that it doesn't come with a cooking grate.
pros: Sturdy and stable tripod made of forged iron
Heavy-duty plated 26" chain with S-hook for easy adjustment
Good for cooking and hanging lanterns, water jugs, or clothing
Strong enough to hold a large cast iron dutch oven
cons: Does not come with grill grate

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stable for the heavy number 4 cast iron pot.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for camping and at the house to prepare food (Potjie food) in a number 4 cast iron pot. This tripod is sturdy and stable for the heavy number 4 cast iron pot full off food. It is easy to adjust the height, either with the chain or by adjusting the legs of the tripod. It works well for me. I am very happy with it. This is the pot I use (
customer_reviews.author: MJvR

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, poor manufacturing process.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after one season. Very cheap, brittle steel bent cold is no good. Tight radius bends have stress fractures - remaining leg is also cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Lepton

customer_reviews.title: Stop! Dont waste your money on other tripods.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously. Dont waste time or money on the other tripods. This thing is a beast. It is solid steel, heavy duty, will not collapse and it is tall enough to suspend a big pot. Adjustable chain is also seriously heavy duty for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Warming up in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Great tripod!
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our haunted trail event during Halloween to hang a cast iron kettle of apple cider over a fire. It worked perfectly! The design is terrific, allowing for varying heights depending upon preference, and folds up nicely. The build quality leaves nothing to be desired either. We plan on bringing this camping in the future, and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this easy to setup and store tripod
customer_reviews.text: This is hefty and strong enough for my cast iron Dutch oven, which is what I needed it for. We used it to also hold my lantern, which I lost parts to the pedistal so I’ve only been able to hang it from tree limbs until now. Boon docking in the desert doesn’t have trees so no longer a problem! I highly recommend this easy to setup and store tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good product, but a bit unstable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tripod for an 8 Quart Cast Iron Dutch Oven with Lid. It was a very sturdy item. However, you must be VERY careful with the placement of this tripod. It fell on us 3 times during the cooking process. Fortunately we were able to catch it with our tongs and hot mitts. Dig this tripod in well! All three legs need to be dug in and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymie Goitia

customer_reviews.title: Sets up just as stated and I thought it was an excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: This items arrived on time and was exactly as described. Sets up just as stated and I thought it was an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: bj

customer_reviews.title: It’s a puzzle.
customer_reviews.text: Great brain training device.No instructions, good luck on figuring out how to set it up. Looks very sturdy. Just received this today. I’ll just mess with it for ten hours until I figure out this brain teaser puzzle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It works well as it is designed. Very solidly built. It's a little tricky to get used to setting up properly, and it can be a little unsteady at first. But overall it still works well and is high quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Damon J. Grandy

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and excellent seller
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived before it was scheduled to in excellent condition, just as described. I am going cross-country and wanted the flexibility to be able to cook outdoors whenever the mood hits. This will get a lot of use. I appreciate the excellent delivery speed, affordable price and dependable seller.
customer_reviews.author: Iedda

customer_reviews.title: haven't had a chance to use this yet. If ...
customer_reviews.text: haven't had a chance to use this yet. If I did it again, I would pick one that I could loosen all three pieces of the tripod so it would allow me to put 2 pieces in the ground and one bar between them in the loops so I could hand multiple kettles from it.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: It is a lot cheaper and better made than the one I had years ago
customer_reviews.text: This is well designed and made. I had no worries putting a 46 lb cast iron pot on it and swinging it around a bit to stir the contents. It is a lot cheaper and better made than the one I had years ago. Great company. I have gotten other items from them and been pleased with all.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine E.

customer_reviews.title: not for camping
customer_reviews.text: Not very tall and I had trouble with the bean pot hanging from it so I took the pot off and used the fire pit grate. I would recommend getting the taller one. Was good for the tripod shelf attachment just wish I had gotten the taller of the 2.
customer_reviews.author: Gorrell family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was as good as I had hoped for. The chain was easy to adjust and the tripod withstood all the weight of a full dutch oven without a blink. I'd happily buy another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: If you in to outdoor cooking - recommend it highly
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty very usable Tripod. It's doing what it supposed to do. Used two times for trip to forest preserves and have no complaints whatsoever. If you in to outdoor cooking - recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: GSREMN

customer_reviews.title: If you want a light weight tripod, this isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: If you want a light weight tripod, this isn't the one for you. But if you want one that will last forever - this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Sred

customer_reviews.title: None
customer_reviews.text: Great product; planning to use it as a campfire meat hydrator stand with attached grates. Loving it
customer_reviews.author: Sandra A.

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Trick photography. The pictures make it look like this tripod is much taller, in a deceptive way. Only three foot tall so will not work over a standard outdoor firepit. Look for 4ft or more.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Keep in mind this one is short double check measurements ...
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind this one is short double check measurements I bought something at lowes to accommodate size. Holds alot of weight
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Campton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tripod itself works great, but I strongly suggest you get the taller one.
customer_reviews.author: Dale B.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my father for Christmas. He was so excited. He has not used it yet but from we could tell so far it is pretty sturdy and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Halo Grace

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the price and for camping on my property I have and I been wanting one of these for some time and this works great.
customer_reviews.author: M.Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for campfire cookout!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. Sturdy and easy to set up and store away.
customer_reviews.author: Weaverfamof6

customer_reviews.title: Yep
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about. Fits into the lodge case for tripods too.
customer_reviews.author: P. WillifordTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: this is so perfect. It gives you that country feeling when you get the cast iron pot with it. It is going to work out so good for my mothers wedding theme
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome. Has worked wonderfully over a stone fire pit ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome. Has worked wonderfully over a stone fire pit I built as well as over other fire sources. It's a conversation starter and a functional tool.
customer_reviews.author: Frank P Centreville, VA

customer_reviews.title: Husbands gift
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband and he loves it. the quality out weighs the quality of any we have found locally. Cant wait to use it camping or in our yard to cook with our cast iron dutch oven.
customer_reviews.author: Nams pj

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great price, will work well for the camping trips. Great quality...that surprised me for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Crane

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to do our cowboy cooking while camping.
customer_reviews.author: M. Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase. Tripod works well over camp fire. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Virgie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use at our cabin. It works great and has held up for many cookouts. Very high quality and will stand the test of time and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: ABH

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have used this at our barn and it has worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: John Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Tripod
customer_reviews.text: It holds the pot over the fire. Does what it was designed for at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: StL Card Fan

customer_reviews.title: Campfire Tripod
customer_reviews.text: Looks and appears exactly as described. Good solid quality product. Great for anyone who likes to camp and cook outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Lukeinashland

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Holds a ton of weight. easy to set up and adjust..
customer_reviews.author: Todd T.

customer_reviews.title: Came just as described.
customer_reviews.text: All 100% durable Cast-Iron. Brings back memories of those Cowboys in movies, settling down for some chow from the Chuckwagon. 100% Practical, in addendum!
customer_reviews.author: devilpup76.2nd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it period, my kids loved the eggs cooked in it. That sold it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Davis

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a surprise for a friend and they LOVED IT!! Very happy it will go to great use
customer_reviews.author: REP

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Holds a heavy 14 qt dutch oven with no isuses
customer_reviews.author: Ann Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great tripod, period
customer_reviews.text: Holds up well to a 12" camp Dutch oven filled.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son as a Fathers day gift. Works great. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: James Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully made!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully made! Heavy duty material insure that this tripod will last a life time! Just wish it could have folding legs for easier packing.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love cooking with this over our fire pit at home and camping.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Our rough and tumble camper in the family thought this was the greatest gift ever! I prefer to hit a local pizza place when camping, but he's looking forward to catching and cooking his dinner.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great - except for one minor issue
customer_reviews.text: It works great but was missing one of the S-rings
customer_reviews.author: Warren R

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This one is nice. I can also use it to hang meat to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great except I wish it were a foot n a half to two feet taller
customer_reviews.author: Robert h Blair

customer_reviews.title: camping must have
customer_reviews.text: works great to keep the pot up - above the fire
customer_reviews.author: Celticstorm76

customer_reviews.title: Great campfire cooking tool
customer_reviews.text: I loved this stand. It made it really easy to adjust the cooking temperature by raising or lowering the pot.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great!
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time. Great for my fire pit!
customer_reviews.author: Cpt. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Little too short but for the money a good buy. It is built well enough and will do the job for a two weekend/year camper.
customer_reviews.author: M. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: ... this as gift for my brother in law he loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as gift for my brother in law he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Setzer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy, held our 5 quart Lodge Dutch oven great!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Sheeley

customer_reviews.title: Camp Fire Tripod
customer_reviews.text: The camp fire tripod I received is of very good heavy duty quality. I do believe it should be a few feet longer to handle a typical recreational camp fire. It would be fine for smaller fires such as back packing fires. I am solving the problem by taking three 40 inch 1/2 inch black iron water pipes, putting each tripod leg inside, then drilling and pinning them. This will add about 30" to each leg.
customer_reviews.author: H. Joe Thompson

customer_reviews.title: campfire tripod
customer_reviews.text: should be a little longer to use over a little larger fire, maybe I can add some length to this with welding rod of a little larger size steel for the ground support,
customer_reviews.author: Rnew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition for camping
customer_reviews.text: Love this tripod. We use it every time we go camping for dutch oven cooking. Makes things much easier than stacking rocks etc...We fashioned a PVC pipe with caps on the end for storing it and easy packing.
customer_reviews.author: SGrace

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Well made. The legs are one piece so no problem about them falling off when moving it. They could be a little longer - another 3 or 4 inches would be ideal. I like the solid feel to it - it should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Dham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to cook over an open fire! My tripod is strong and sturdy and works great. I'll have to say it has been a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse/Creative Musician

customer_reviews.title: Campfire Tripod Good and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Was everything the description said. Made of cast iron, sturdy and came with hooked chain to hang pots and whatnot on it. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Landers

customer_reviews.title: out door fireplace product
customer_reviews.text: works very well, durable. Could have legs be about 3-5" taller, otherwise excellent. I would recommend to any proficient camper
customer_reviews.author: kramer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a great little tripod. It was the right height over the fire to hang a pot or coffee pot.
customer_reviews.author: Ned N.

customer_reviews.title: Texsport campfire tripod
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and sturdy. Easy to adjust the dutch oven on the chain to height needed and holds the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Arrived on-time. Packaged well. Doesn't need instructions as very easy to setup and use right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Only poles and drop down chain
customer_reviews.text: Ok- this is just the poles and chain- not the system shown in the photo. Get your own grill, etc.. Sturdy set up and I will make my own system with what is provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind of annoying it does not come with the grill
customer_reviews.text: Kind of annoying it does not come with the grill. I thought that would be an easy buy...not really easy to find the perfect grill to work with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Texsport Campfire Tripod
customer_reviews.text: Really loved the Texsport Campfire Tripod. I like the strength and sturdiness and is exactly what we need while camping. Will be using it in the coming summer months. I would recommend this item gladly.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Price

customer_reviews.title: Great way to cook a killer pot of beans
customer_reviews.text: I really live this simple devise sets up in seconds and you are ready to start cooking a great campfire meal.
customer_reviews.author: Jackriverboy

customer_reviews.title: There are better.
customer_reviews.text: Could be better at no extra manufacturing cost. Look for one that easily reconfigures to a 2 post + crossbar.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Marler

customer_reviews.title: not high enough
customer_reviews.text: by looking at the picture it looks a lot higher it is only about 30 inches high opened up and not even close to doing what is pictured I had to have extensions welded on
customer_reviews.author: Robert Long

customer_reviews.title: nice but short
customer_reviews.text: I recently received my tripod. It appears to be very sturdy and well made. The only concern is that it seems too short, as a tall person I would have to be bending too much to use it. I ordered a taller one and I did keep this one because the price is very modest.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: camp tripod griller
customer_reviews.text: I used it for camping to heat the coffee and grill steaks on the grill portion. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: It did not meet my expectations at all.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying the material for my husband to make me one that would not fall when I tried to hand my kettle on it. I was very disapointed in the campfire tripod that I I bought
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Stout

customer_reviews.title: Renee's review of the Campfire Tripod
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot to say about this Campfire Tripod, other than it works like it's supposesd to!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Duquet Kamptner

customer_reviews.title: I should have waited - now $5.00 cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I still have not gotten my order - 12-11-2009 - The tripod may be great but it would have been better if I had been given the $5.00 discount - This $5.00 off special began before my tripod was shipped - and I hope it comes soon !!! It is scheduled for delivery between the 10th and 15th of December!
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Matthews

product_meta.title: Texsport Campfire Cooking Dutch Oven Tripod and Lantern Hanger
product_meta.description: 42.5” h. constructed of forged iron with a Heavy-duty plated 26” chain. Designed to hold Cast Iron Cookware over campfire. Sturdy and Stable Three Leg Design Constructed of Forged Iron, 42½" Hig
feature_bullets: Sturdy and Stable Three Leg Design Constructed of Forged Iron, 42½" High
Heavy-Duty Plated 26" Chain with "S" hook for easy cooking height adjustment
Designed to hang Dutch Ovens, Coffee Pots etc over a campfire
Other uses include hanging Lanters, Water Jugs, or Clothing

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
